name: Empire-db
short_description: Empire-db is a relational data persistence component for Java. Unlike Hibernate it uses a Java object model mapping, dynamic beans with comprehensive metadata support and an intuitive, type-safe and string-free SQL command API.

license.fullpath: License :: OSI-Approved Open Source :: Apache License V2.0
